statements: SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT user_id, post_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT post_id, user_id FROM interactions WHERE post_id = 123456;
SELECT interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 987654 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 123456 ORDER BY interaction_type ASC, post_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, post_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'comment' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM interactions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT post_title, post_author FROM blog_posts;
SELECT post_title, post_date, likes_count FROM blog_posts WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT post_id, post_title, post_content, post_author, post_date FROM blog_posts WHERE post_author = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_id, post_id, action FROM user_interactions WHERE action = 'like';
SELECT post_id, post_title, comments_count FROM blog_posts WHERE comments_count > 50 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, action FROM user_interactions WHERE action = 'like';
SELECT post_title, post_content, post_date FROM blog_posts WHERE post_author = 'John Doe';
SELECT post_id, post_title, likes_count FROM blog_posts ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_title, comments_count FROM blog_posts WHERE comments_count > 10;
SELECT post_author, COUNT(post_id) AS post_count FROM blog_posts GROUP BY post_author;
SELECT * FROM likes;
SELECT post_id, user_id FROM comments ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id, share_time FROM shares WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, post_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND post_id = 'cfc1411f-ccc5-4f04-b280-0d9731fe50c9';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM likes WHERE post_id = '8ee13ff9-4d2f-49ea-b348-169e25c504a1';
SELECT user_id, post_id FROM likes WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE post_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-efghijklmnop';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM likes GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, comment_text FROM comments ORDER BY comment_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, post_id, share_time FROM shares WHERE share_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY share_time DESC;

SELECT user_id, post_id FROM shares WHERE post_id = 4;
SELECT post_id, post_title, post_content FROM blog_posts WHERE post_id > 2;

SELECT user_id, post_id FROM likes WHERE like_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
